spark.api
Interface Triples

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable, CursoredResult<Triple>, Iterable<Triple>, Result
public interface Triples
extends CursoredResult<Triple>

Cursored access to a sequence of triples. Each triple consists of a subject, predicate, and object

For the current triple under the cursor, these generic methods can be used to inspect the solution:

  • getTriple() - return a Triple with SPO
  • getSubject() - just subject
  • getPredicate() - just predicate
  • getObject() - just object

Method Summary
 RDFNode getObject()
          Get the object for the triple at the cursor.
